name: CodeKer - Arbisoft
description: A Visual Studio Code extension that uses a locally hosted large language model to generate code completions, ensuring that proprietary client code is never exposed to third-party services.
role: Worked as a research consultant to define and shape the idea of securing proprietary client code through locally hosted LLM-based code completion
Evaluated and compared existing tools and large language models to assess performance and suitability for the intended use case
Customized and extended an existing Visual Studio Code extension to integrate with a locally hosted LLM and support configurable workflows
Deployed Code LLaMA 13B on RunPod using Hugging Face Text Generation Inference and exposed APIs for internal developer consumption
